description: Summarizes technical text for non-technical people

input_variables.name: input
input_variables.description: The input text to be summarized.

input_variables.name: curl
input_variables.description: The CURL command that was executed.

input_variables.name: response
input_variables.description: The successful response from the CURL command.

input_variables.name: swaggerFileName
input_variables.description: The Swagger file name used to build the CURL command.
